main event: A witness reported seeing a strange aircraft which was later identified as a pilot balloon.
interesting points: The report was dated August 2, 1950, and took place in Belle Vernon, Pa.,The object was described as a red pilot balloon,The witness initially thought the object was a strange aircraft,The object was determined to be expendable and unclassified,There is no photograph included in the report.
witness description: A person who reported seeing the object and filmed it, later communicated through a letter.
